definition: a platform built out from the shore into the water and supported by piles, moor at a wharf
details:
noun
- a platform built out from the shore into the water and supported by piles
= synonyms: dock
verb
- moor at a wharf
= example: moor at a wharf
- come into or dock at a wharf
= example: come into or dock at a wharf
= synonyms: berth
- discharge at a wharf
= example: discharge at a wharf
- store on a wharf
- provide with a wharf
